text: Hi Oz! Do you happen to have a link to Permit? I am unfamiliar with this software/service.
Hi Everyone! completely new to HubSpot development! wanted to learn more!

Permit is built on top of OPA and OPAL, an OSS project we built that keeps OPA updated in real time for policy changes.

Permit is another layer for a SAAS project
I was thinking of collaborating by building a demo + article for which OPAL query HubSpot using data fetcher and retrieve data in real time and updates OPA
